SELECT count(*) FROM db_discussion d left join sys_user u on d.createUserId=u.id where 1=1 and d.level = #{level}
and d.title like CONCAT('%', #{title },'%')
SELECT d.*,u.name as createUserName FROM db_discussion d left join sys_user u on d.createUserId=u.id WHERE d.id = #{id}
select * from (SELECT d.*, t.unit, t.id testId, t.a, t.b, t.c, t.remark FROM db_discussion d LEFT JOIN db_testunit t ON d.id = t.disId AND d. LEVEL = t.`level` ) v where 1=1 and v.id = #{id}

select * from (SELECT d.*, t.disId, t.unit, t.a, t.b, t.c, t.remark, c.testId, c.npcId, c.choice, c.remark AS ansRemark, c.subTime FROM db_discussion d LEFT JOIN db_testunit t ON d.id = t.disId LEFT JOIN db_choice c ON c.disId = d.id AND c.testId = t.id ) v where 1=1 and v.id = #{disId} and v.npcId = #{npcId}

select v.* ,u.name as name from (SELECT d.*, t.disId, t.unit, t.a, t.b, t.c, t.remark, c.testId, c.npcId, c.choice, c.remark AS ansRemark, c.subTime FROM db_discussion d LEFT JOIN db_testunit t ON d.id = t.disId LEFT JOIN db_choice c ON c.disId = d.id AND c.testId = t.id ) v left join sys_user u on u.id = v.npcId where 1=1 and v.disId = #{disId} and v.npcId = #{npcId}
select * from (select disId,testId,choice,count(id) chooseNum from db_choice c group by disId,testId,choice ) v where 1=1 and v.disId = #{id} ORDER BY v.testId
select joinTotal from (select disId,count(npcId) joinTotal from (select disId,npcId from db_choice c group by disId,npcId ) b group by b.disId ) v where v.disId = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_choice( disId, testId, npcId, choice, remark, subTime, level ) VALUES ( #{disId}, #{testId}, #{npcId}, #{choice}, #{remark}, #{subTime}, #{level} )
